samples.description: "Converts a unix timestamp to a Python datetime object"

documentation.datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp: timestamp[, tz] -> tz's local time from POSIX timestamp.

samples.description:
Return the value at key ``name``, raises a KeyError if the key
        doesn't exist.

documentation.get: Return the value at key ``name``, or None if the key doesn't exist

snippet_lines:
value = self.get(name)
        if value is not None:
            return value
        raise KeyError(name)
